Uses of Class
dataset.Attribute

Packages that use Attribute 
Package Description
classifier
Contains classes and interfaces necessary to build classifiers and evaluate their performance.
dataset
Contains the necessary classes and interface to create a dataset, consisting of attributes and classes represented by integers and also to load them from a file.

    protected int AbstractBayesianNetworkClassifier.computeNijkc​(Attribute i, Attribute i_prime, int j, int k, int c)
    Compute number of instances in the train set where the attribute i takes the value k, the attribute i_prime takes the value j and the class takes the value c.
    protected int AbstractBayesianNetworkClassifier.computeNikc​(Attribute i, int k, int c)
    Compute number of instances in the train set where the attribute i takes the value k and the class takes the value c.
    protected double AbstractBayesianNetworkClassifier.computeOFE​(Attribute i, Attribute i_parent, int j, int k, int c)
    Computes the observed frequency estimates (theta_ijkc) for attribute i, whose parent is i_parent, where i takes the value k, i_parent takes the value j and the class takes the value c
    protected abstract double AbstractBayesianNetworkClassifier.computeWeight​(Attribute i, Attribute j)
